chapter.title: Traffic Input Library Developer Guide
chapter.para: This section consists of a description of the intention and use of the input part of the Traffic library with a description of each class and its simplified interface. The class overviews are sorted in alphabetic ascending order to be able to find a class description faster when knowing the name of it.

This document describes how the input part of the Traffic library is structured and consists of the following parts:
Overview
Gives an overview of the classes that are involved in the input part of the Traffic library
Classes
Describes each class of the input part of the Traffic library
